titleStmt.title: A petition of the citie of Westminster, and the parishes of Saint Clement Danes, and Saint Martins in the Fields: as it was carried from them by Sir Edward Warder, Doctor Castle, Doctor Fuller, and Doctor Duckson, and by them presented to his Sacred Majestie at Oxford. With His Majesties gracious answer concerning the said petition.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I). aut

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
